# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-

e_baltic_empire = {
	color = { 50 80 102 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

	capital = 420 # c_aukshayts of d_lithuanians
	culture = lithuanian

	lithuanian = "Baltijos"
	prussian = "Baltijos"
	lettigallish = "Baltijas"

	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { FROM = { has_holder = no } }
			has_landed_title = k_lithuania
			trigger_if = {
				limit = { emf_has_swmh = yes }
				has_landed_title = k_terra
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
}

# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-

d_arsiyah = {
	color={ 217 160 27 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }

	# graphical_culture = hashshashingfx

	capital = 620 #	Itil

	title = "GRANDHEADMASTER"
	foa = "GRANDHEADMASTER_FOA"

	holy_order = yes

	# Always exists
	landless = yes

	culture = khazar

	# Parent Religion
	religion = sunni

	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes

	# Cannot be vassalized
	independent = yes

	# Extra income due to donations, etc
	monthly_income = 2 # (Must be an integer between 1 and 512)

	mercenary_type = arsiyah_composition
}

d_saqaliba = {
	color={ 25 128 70 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }

	# graphical_culture = bektashigfx

	capital = 502 # Rashka

	title = "GRANDHEADMASTER"
	foa = "GRANDHEADMASTER_FOA"

	holy_order = yes

	# Always exists
	landless = yes

	culture = serbian

	# Parent Religion
	religion = ismaili

	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes

	# Cannot be vassalized
	independent = yes

	# Extra income due to donations, etc
	monthly_income = 2 # (Must be an integer between 1 and 512)

	mercenary_type = saqaliba_composition
}
# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-

e_hre_french = {
	color = { 96 172 240 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

	capital = 112 # Paris
	culture = frankish
	short_name = yes

	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
				FROM = { has_holder = no } # Don't limit culture of AI peaceful usurpers
			}
			OR = {
				culture = low_frankish
				culture = dutch
				culture = frankish
				culture = occitan
				culture = norman
				culture = arpitan
			}
		}
		FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_holder = yes } # Usurpation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 320
				FROM = { has_law = crown_authority_4 }
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_holder = no } # Creation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 320
				primary_title = {
					emf_laws_has_high_ca_plus = yes
				}
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
}
# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-


# Alternate versions of kingdom-tier titles for New World Order

# Currently these are only to replace certain SWMH HRE stem duchies that are king-tier but name_tier = DUKE
# with lookalikes that have normal name_tier and creation conditions when NWO is used.

k_emf_lower_lorraine = {
	color={ 255 204 20 }
	color2={ 255 204 0 }

	capital = 117 #Brabant
	culture = dutch

	catholic = 4000 # Crusade target weight
	norse_pagan_reformed = 50 # Crusade target weight

	dutch = "Lotharingen"
	german = "Lothringen"

	allow = {
		title_king_basic_allow = yes
	}
}

k_emf_saxony = {
	color={ 78 98 40 }
	color2={ 220 220 20 }

	capital = 258 #Lüneburg
	culture = german

	catholic = 2500 # Crusade target weight
	norse_pagan_reformed = 200 # Crusade target weight
	slavic_pagan_reformed = 200 # Crusade target weight
	baltic_pagan_reformed = 50 # Crusade target weight

	allow = {
		title_king_basic_allow = yes
	}
}

# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-

# Here to override the titular e_null definition from HIP_Common (this placeholder
# empire is already defined de jure in swmh_landed_titles.txt)
# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-


e_hip = {
	color = { 123 0 255 }
	color2 = { 224 224 224 }

	capital = 1 # Give her a remote capital so that her diplomatic range is limited (no capital = unlimited range)

	culture = hip_culture
	religion = hip_religion

	# this way, her religion cannot change (without unsafe_religion), so the event pre-trigger religion = hip_religion
	# alone is the fastest possible filter & we can rely on isis to simply never change religion.
	controls_religion = hip_religion

	title = HIP_TITLE
	title_female = HIP_TITLE
	foa = HIP_TITLE_FOA

	landless = yes
	primary = yes
	short_name = yes
	dynasty_title_names = no
	can_be_usurped = no
	can_be_claimed = no

	allow = { always = no }
}
# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-

	color2 = { 0 0 0 }
}

	pirate = yes

	color2 = { 0 0 0 }
}
# SPECIAL TITLES
k_hellenic_pagan = {
	color = { 124 0 175 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 333 # Rome
	title = PONTIFEX_MAXIMUS
	title_female = PONTIFEX_MAXIMA
	foa = POPE_FOA
	short_name = yes
	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 100 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed
	religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed
	assimilate = no
	dynasty_title_names = no # Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.
}
k_papal_state = { # Status Pontificius
	color = { 255 249 198 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 333 # Roma # Rome
	title = POPE
	title_female = POPESS
	foa = POPE_FOA
	short_name = yes
	location_ruler_title = yes
	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = catholic
	religion = catholic
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
	assimilate = no
	dynasty_title_names = no # Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.
	# Regnal names
	male_names = {
		Ioannes:13 Benedictus:10 Gregorius:8 Innocentius:7 Clemens:5 Leo:5 Nicolaus:5 Stephanus:5 Urbanus:5
		Coelestinus:4 Hadrianus:4 Alexander:3 Bonifatius:3 Honorius:3 Anastasius:2 Callistus:2 Eugenius:2 Lucius:2
		Marinus:2 Martinus:2 Sergius:2 Silvester:2 Victor:2 Agapitus:1 Damasus:1 Formosus:1 Gelasius:1 Landus:1
		Paschalis:1 Paulus:1 Pius:1 Romanus:1 Theodorus:1 Xystus:1
	}
}

		Ioannes Ioseph Isidoros Kallinikos Kallistos Konstantinos Kosmas Kyrillos Leon Leontios Loukas Makarios

	color = { 217 155 177 }

		Petros Philotheos Shenouda Simeon Theodoros Theophilus Timotheos Zacharias
	}
}

d_yazidi = { # The Yazidi Sheikhdom
	color = { 20 50 160 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 697 # Mosul
	dignity = 80 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	title = SHEIKH
	title_female = SHEIKHA

		religion = yazidi
	}

}
d_ibadi = { # The Ibadi Imamate
	color = { 20 130 20 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 719 # Makkah # Mecca
	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 80 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	title = IMAM
	title_female = IMAMA
	foa = IMAM_FOA
	short_name = yes
	religion = ibadi
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = ibadi
	caliphate = yes
	coat_of_arms = {
		data = { 0 0 0 8 0 2 2 }
		religion = ibadi
	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			trait = mirza
			trait = sayyid
			piety = 1000
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_alternate_start_parameter = {
						key = religion_names
						value = random
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = ibadi_creation_independent
				hidden_tooltip = {
					in_revolt = no
					OR = {
						independent = yes
						NOT = {
							any_liege = {
								OR = {
									in_revolt = yes
									NOT = { religion = ibadi }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = sayyid
					piety = 1000
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates } }
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = controls_mecca_medina
						hidden_tooltip = {
							c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
							c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						}
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_jerusalem_damascus_baghdad
					hidden_tooltip = {
						c_jerusalem = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_damascus = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_baghdad = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = THREE_HOLY_SITES_TT
				hidden_tooltip = {
					any_realm_title = {
						count = 3
						is_holy_site = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_mecca_medina
				hidden_tooltip = {
					c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
	}
} # end d_ibadi
d_kharijite = { # The Kharijite Caliphate
	color = { 10 110 10 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 719 # Makkah # Mecca
	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 80 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	title = CALIPH
	title_female = CALIPHA
	foa = CALIPH_FOA
	short_name = yes
	religion = kharijite
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = kharijite
	caliphate = yes
	coat_of_arms = {
		data = { 0 0 0 8 0 2 2 }
		religion = kharijite
	}
	allow = {
		piety = 1000
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_alternate_start_parameter = {
						key = religion_names
						value = random
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates } }
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = controls_mecca_medina
						hidden_tooltip = {
							c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
							c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						}
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_jerusalem_damascus_baghdad
					hidden_tooltip = {
						c_jerusalem = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_damascus = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_baghdad = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = THREE_HOLY_SITES_TT
				hidden_tooltip = {
					any_realm_title = {
						count = 3
						is_holy_site = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_mecca_medina
				hidden_tooltip = {
					c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
	}
} # end d_kharijite
d_hurufi = { # The Hurufi Skeikhdom
	color = { 80 220 80 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 719 # Makkah # Mecca
	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 100 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	title = CALIPH
	title_female = CALIPHA
	foa = CALIPH_FOA
	short_name = yes
	religion = hurufi
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = hurufi
	caliphate = yes
	coat_of_arms = {
		data = { 0 0 0 7 1 7 7 }
		religion = hurufi
	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			trait = mirza
			trait = sayyid
			piety = 1000
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_alternate_start_parameter = {
						key = religion_names
						value = random
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = sayyid
					piety = 1000
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates } }
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = controls_mecca_medina
						hidden_tooltip = {
							c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
							c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						}
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_jerusalem_damascus_baghdad
					hidden_tooltip = {
						c_jerusalem = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_damascus = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_baghdad = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = THREE_HOLY_SITES_TT
				hidden_tooltip = {
					any_realm_title = {
						count = 3
						is_holy_site = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_mecca_medina
				hidden_tooltip = {
					c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
	}
} # end d_hurufi

	foa = CAPTAIN_FOA

# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-

d_sunni = { # The Sunni Caliphate
	color = { 40 160 40 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 693 # Baghdad
	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 100 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	title = CALIPH
	title_female = CALIPHA
	foa = CALIPH_FOA
	short_name = yes
	religion = sunni
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = sunni
	caliphate = yes
	coat_of_arms = {
		data = { 0 0 0 3 0 2 2 }
		religion = sunni
	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			trait = mirza
			trait = sayyid
			piety = 1000
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_alternate_start_parameter = {
						key = religion_names
						value = random
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = sunni_creation_independent
				hidden_tooltip = {
					in_revolt = no
					OR = {
						independent = yes
						NOT = {
							any_liege = {
								OR = {
									in_revolt = yes
									NOT = { religion = sunni }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = sayyid
					piety = 1000
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates } }
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = controls_mecca_medina
						hidden_tooltip = {
							c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
							c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						}
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_jerusalem_damascus_baghdad
					hidden_tooltip = {
						c_jerusalem = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_damascus = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_baghdad = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = THREE_HOLY_SITES_TT
				hidden_tooltip = {
					any_realm_title = {
						count = 3
						is_holy_site = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_mecca_medina
				hidden_tooltip = {
					c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
	}
} # end d_sunni
# -*- ck2.landed_titles -*-

	# Parent Religion
	religion = catholic
	mercenary = yes
	title = CAPTAIN
	foa = CAPTAIN_FOA
	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
	# Cannot be vassalized
	independent = yes
	strength_growth_per_century = 1.0
	mercenary_type = white_company_composition
	# Hire Trigger
	allow = {
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = { is_alternate_start = no }
			religion_group = christian
		}
	}
}

d_saxon_band = { # Saxon Band
	color = { 220 90 90 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 57 # The West Riding # York
	mercenary = yes
	# Parent Religion
	religion = catholic
	culture = saxon
	title = CAPTAIN
	foa = CAPTAIN_FOA
	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
	# Cannot be vassalized
	independent = yes
	strength_growth_per_century = 1.0
	mercenary_type = saxon_band_composition
	# Hire Trigger
	allow = {
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = { is_alternate_start = no }
			OR = {
				NOT = { year = 1100 }
				any_independent_ruler = { culture = saxon }
			}
			religion_group = christian
		}
	}
}

	replace_captain_on_death = yes
	strength_growth_per_century = 0.1
	mercenary_type = scholae_palatinae_composition
}

	k_swabia_otto = {
		color = { 173 186 255 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		capital = 253 # Württemberg
		allow = {
			FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
			title_king_basic_allow = yes
		}
	}
	allow = {
		FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = EMF
				FROM = { has_holder = yes } # Usurpation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 320
				FROM = { has_law = crown_authority_4 }
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = EMF
				FROM = { has_holder = no } # Creation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 320
				primary_title = {
					OR = {
						has_law = crown_authority_3
						has_law = crown_authority_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes # Takes care of the min. 120 realm_size requirement
	}
} # end e_hre
e_roman_empire = { # Roman Empire
	color = { 167 10 100 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 333 # Roma # Rome
	short_name = yes
	purple_born_heirs = yes
	culture = italian
	religion = orthodox
	roman = "Imperium Romanum"
	norwegian = "Rómverska keisaradæmið"
	danish = "Rómverska keisaradæmið"
	swedish = "Rómverska keisaradæmið"
	anglonorse = "Rómverska keisaradæmið"
	norse = "Rómverska keisaradæmið"
	norsegaelic = "Rómverska keisaradæmið"
	icelandic = "Rómverska keisaradæmið"
	bohemian = "Rzímská Rzíe"
	hungarian = "Római Birodalom"
	szekely = "Római Birodalom"
	polish = "Cesarstwo Rzymski"
	serbian = "Rimsko Carstvo"
	croatian = "Rimsko Carstvo"
	bosnian = "Rimsku Imperiju"
	carantanian = "Rimsko Cesárstvo"
	russian = "Rimskaya Imperiya"
	bulgarian = "Rimska Imperiya"
	romanian = "Imperiul Roman"
	arberian = "Perandoria Romake"
	armenian = "Hrromeakan Kaysrut'yun"
	georgian = "Romis Imperia"
	allow = {
		FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = EMF
				FROM = { has_holder = yes } # Usurpation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 420
				FROM = { has_law = crown_authority_4 }
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = EMF
				FROM = { has_holder = no } # Creation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 420
				primary_title = {
					OR = {
						has_law = crown_authority_3
						has_law = crown_authority_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
} # end e_roman_empire

		}

			owner_under_ROOT = yes

					NOT = { empire = { title = FROM } }
				}
				empire = { title = FROM }
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}

	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = EMF
				FROM = { has_holder = yes } # Usurpation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 220
				FROM = { has_law = crown_authority_4 }
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = EMF
				FROM = { has_holder = no } # Creation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 220
				primary_title = {
					OR = {
						has_law = crown_authority_3
						has_law = crown_authority_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
} # end e_arabia

		gain_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_de_jure_title = no } }
				custom_tooltip = { text = ENGLAND_BECOMES_DE_JURE_TT }
			}
		}
		allow = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = { FROM = { is_de_jure_title = no } }
				independent = yes
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = CONTROLS_HALF_OF_ENGLISH_REGION_TT
					# AI creates this title solely via explicit maintenance,
					# so none of this is for them
					ai = no
					any_realm_province = {
						# there are 43 counties in the current custom_england;
						# this is >50%
						count = 22
						region = custom_england
					}
				}
			}
			title_king_basic_allow = yes
		}
	} # end k_england

		gain_effect = {
			# If title receiver also owns the titular Tara, then
			# we can safely destroy and deactivate that title now.
			k_ireland_titular = { # Tara
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_holder = no
							holder = PREV
						}
					}
					hidden_tooltip = {
						# If it somehow became non-titular, then we must be sure
						# to transfer its de jure territory to k_ireland first.
						any_direct_de_jure_vassal_title = { de_jure_liege = k_ireland }
					}
					activate_title = {
						title = THIS
						status = no
					}
					destroy_landed_title = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		allow = { title_king_basic_allow = yes }
	} # end k_ireland

		}
	}
	gain_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				k_naples = {
					is_de_jure_title = yes
					NOT = { de_jure_liege = FROM }
				}
			}
			k_naples = {
				show_scope_change = no
				de_jure_liege = FROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				k_trinacria = {
					is_de_jure_title = yes
					NOT = { de_jure_liege = FROM }
				}
			}
			k_trinacria = {
				show_scope_change = no
				de_jure_liege = FROM
			}
		}
	}
	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion_group = christian } }
			FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
		}
		has_landed_title = k_italy
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { k_sicily = { is_de_jure_title = yes } }
			has_landed_title = k_sicily
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				k_naples = {
					is_de_jure_title = yes
					OR = {
						k_sicily = { is_de_jure_title = no }
						NOT = { de_jure_liege = FROM }
					}
				}
			}
			has_landed_title = k_naples
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				k_trinacria = {
					is_de_jure_title = yes
					OR = {
						k_sicily = { is_de_jure_title = no }
						NOT = { de_jure_liege = FROM }
					}
				}
			}
			has_landed_title = k_trinacria
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
} # end e_italy

		hidden_tooltip = {
			OR = {
				ai = no
				culture = frankish
				culture = breton
				culture = occitan
				culture = norman
			}
		}
		OR = {
			religion_group = christian
			FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
		}
		has_landed_title = k_france
		has_landed_title = k_burgundy
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}

					culture_group = iberian

				}

			c_ribagorza = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }

		}

		# Creation/usurpation trigger
		#allow = { title_king_basic_allow = yes }
		allow = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					culture_group = iberian
					religion_group = christian
				}
				FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
			}
			c_braga = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			c_braganza = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			title_king_basic_allow = yes
		}

		# Creation/usurpation trigger
		allow = {
			hidden_tooltip = {
				OR = {
					ai = no
					culture = maghreb_arabic
					culture = bedouin_arabic
					culture = levantine_arabic
					culture = egyptian_arabic
					culture = andalusian_arabic
					culture = hijazi
					culture = yemeni
					culture = sicilian_arabic
				}
			}
			title_king_basic_allow = yes
		}

	# TITULAR SWMH Spain
	# Kingdom level:
	# reino de Galicia - now de jure

	# Principado de Cataluña
	k_catalunya = { # Catalunya
		color = { 200 0 50 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		capital = 204 # Barcelona
		allow = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					culture_group = iberian
					religion_group = christian
				}
				FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
			}
			c_urgell = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			c_rosello = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			c_empuries = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			c_lleida = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			c_tarragona = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			c_girona = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			title_king_basic_allow = yes
		}
	}
	# Reino de Valencia - now de jure as a placeholder kingdom

	gain_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = reconquista_finished } }
			any_playable_ruler = { narrative_event = { id = HF.49451 } }
			ROOT = { narrative_event = { id = HF.49451 } }
			set_global_flag = reconquista_finished
		}
	}
	# Creation/usurpation trigger
	allow = {
		hidden_tooltip = {
			OR = {
				ai = no
				culture_group = iberian
				culture = andalusian_arabic
			}
		}
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = {
				FROM = { any_direct_de_jure_vassal_title = { owner = { NOT = { religion_group = ROOT } } } }
				has_dlc = "Holy Fury"

			custom_tooltip = {
				text = e_spain_allow_TT
				always = no
			}
		}
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = { has_global_flag = active_reconquista }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = active_reconquista_condition_TT
				always = no
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}

	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = EMF
				FROM = { has_holder = yes } # Usurpation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 220
				FROM = { has_law = crown_authority_4 }
			}
		}
		trigger_else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = EMF
				FROM = { has_holder = no } # Creation
			}
			OR = {
				realm_size >= 220
				primary_title = {
					OR = {
						has_law = crown_authority_3
						has_law = crown_authority_4
					}
				}
			}
		}
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
} # end e_persia

# All landed kingdom titles that have no de jure empire must go
# into e_null, a clever solution to Paradox bugs.
e_null = { #
	color = { 38 38 38 }
	color2 = { 0 0 0 }
	capital = 333
	can_be_usurped = no
	can_be_claimed = no
	short_name = yes
	# Must be defined before k_armenia
	k_bagratid_grand_principality = { # Hayk
		color = { 117 178 81 }
		culture = armenian
		capital = 681 # Ani
		title = ISHKHAN

		gain_effect = {
			# If title receiver also owns the titular Hayk, then
			# we can safely destroy and deactivate that title now.
			k_bagratid_grand_principality = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_holder = no
							holder = PREV
						}
					}
					hidden_tooltip = {
						# If it somehow became non-titular, then we must be sure
						# to transfer its de jure territory to k_armenia first.
						any_direct_de_jure_vassal_title = { de_jure_liege = k_armenia }
					}
					activate_title = {
						title = THIS
						status = no
					}
					destroy_landed_title = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		allow = { title_king_basic_allow = yes }
	} # end k_armenia

				AND = {

						independent = yes

							NOT = { tier = emperor }

				}

					culture = pommeranian
					prestige = 3000
				}
			}

			limit = { FROM = { is_de_jure_title = no } }

		hidden_tooltip = {
			OR = {
				ai = no

			}
		}
	}

# TITULAR EMPIRES
e_latin_empire = { # Imperium Romaniae
	color = { 150 105 56 }
	capital = 496 # Konstantinoupolis # Byzantion
	short_name = yes
	allow = {
		OR = {
			religion = catholic
			is_heresy_of = catholic
			FROM = { is_de_jure_title = yes }
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { e_roman_empire = { has_holder = yes } }
			e_roman_empire = { has_holder = no }
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { e_byzantium = { has_holder = yes } }
			e_byzantium = { has_holder = no }
		}
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = controls_kaliopolis_thrake
			hidden_tooltip = {
				495 = { # Kaliopolis
					owner_under_ROOT = yes
				}
				497 = { # Thrake
					owner_under_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		c_byzantion = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
		title_emperor_basic_allow = yes
	}
} # end e_latin_empire

### TITULAR TITLE DEFINITIONS FOR COMPATIBILITY PURPOSES ###
e_russian_empire = {
	color={ 220 60 70 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
	capital = 582 # Vladimir
	culture = russian
	allow = {
		always = no # Only created through special event (removed in SWMH)
	}
}
e_nicaea = {
	color={ 240 17 17 }
	color2={ 255 255 20 }
	capital = 750 # Nikaea
	culture = greek
	short_name = yes
	has_top_de_jure_capital = yes
	allow = {
		NOT = { has_global_flag = EMF } #EMF+SWMH has special code for a Fourth Crusade-like scenario
		conditional_tooltip = {
			trigger = {
				e_nicaea = {
					is_titular = yes
				}
			}
			e_nicaea = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}
	}
}

			limit = {
				NAND = {
					is_heretic = no

						religion = catholic
						religion = cathar
						religion = fraticelli
						religion = waldensian
						religion = lollard
						religion = adoptionist
						religion = arian
					}
				}
			}
			is_heretic = no
			OR = {
				religion = catholic
				religion = cathar
				religion = fraticelli
				religion = waldensian
				religion = lollard
				religion = adoptionist
				religion = arian
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { FROM = { is_de_jure_title = no } }

		}

#baronial CoA code entry template

#coat_of_arms= {
#		data= { 
#			0 #composition/template 
#			5 #index de texture/texture ID
#			0 #élément en superposition/emblem
#			13 #index interne à la texture/texture internal
#			0 #couleur 1/colour 1
#			0 #couleur 2/colour 2
#			0 #couleur 3/colour 3
#			}
#		religion="catholic" #blason seulement actif pour cette religion, sinon random
#	}

#compact version #b_cluny = { coat_of_arms = { data = { 0 5 0 13 0 0 0 }	religion="catholic"	} }#

#from dynasty file
b_cluny  	= 	{ coat_of_arms = { data =	{ 0 5 0 13 0 0 0 }	religion="catholic" } }

d_apostolic = {
	color = { 51 25 0 }
	color2 = { 230 220 108 }
	capital = 1531 # Varazhnunik

	title = "CATHOLICOS"
	foa = "POPE_FOA"

	allow = {
		always = no
	}

	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	short_name = yes
	dignity = 80 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does

	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = apostolic
	religion = apostolic
	culture = armenian

	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes

	dynasty_title_names = no	 # Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.

	# Regnal names
	male_names = {
		Aleksandr Ananias Aristaces Asdvadzadur Constantine Davit Dertad Eliazar Gevorg Giragos Grigor Isaiah Hacob Joab Hovhannes Hovsep
		Karapet Khachig Mashdotz Mekhitar Mesrop Mikayel Movses Nahabed Nerses Parsegh Petros Philippos Sarkis Sion Soghomon Stephan
		Thoros Vahan Yeghishe Zacharias
	}
}

	color = { 238 224 147 }
	color2 = { 230 220 108 }
	capital = 213 # Carcassone

	allow = {
		always = no # Only by special decision
	}

	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	primary = yes
	dignity = 100

	title = "CATHAR_PATRIARCH"
	title_female = "CATHAR_MATRIARCH"
	foa = "POPE_FOA"
	short_name = yes

	religion = cathar

	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = cathar

	dynasty_title_names = no	 # Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.

	gain_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { trait = perfecti } }
			emf_notify_add_perfecti = yes
		}
	}
}

d_druze = {
	color = { 60 190 60 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 770 # Beirut
	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 100 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	dynasty_title_names = no	 # Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.
	caliphate = yes

	title = "SHAYKH"
	title_female = "SHAYKHA"
	foa = "IMAM_FOA"
	short_name = yes

	religion = druze
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = druze

	allow = {
		religion = druze
		is_adult = yes
		has_regent = no
		war = no
		piety = 1000
		trait = druze_ajawid
		num_of_holy_sites = 1
		higher_tier_than = DUKE
	}
	gain_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = druze_shaykh }
			}
			hidden_tooltip = {
				narrative_event = { id = emf_heresy.1968 }
			}
		}
	}
}

d_hashshashin = {
	religion = ismaili
}

d_ismaili = {
	color = { 60 190 60 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 719 # Mecca

	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 100 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	religion = ismaili
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = ismaili
	assimilate = no
	caliphate = yes
	coat_of_arms = {
		data = { 0 0 0 9 1 7 7 }
		religion = ismaili
	}
	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = ismaili } }
			religion = ismaili
		}
		OR = {
			trait = mirza
			trait = sayyid
			piety = 1000
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = ismaili_bloodline_TT
				any_owned_bloodline = {
					has_bloodline_flag = bloodline_ismaili_leader
					bloodline_is_active_for = PREV
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_random_religions = no }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = ismaili_creation_independent
				in_revolt = no
				OR = {
					independent = yes
					NOT = {
						any_liege = {
							OR = {
								in_revolt = yes
								NOT = { religion = ismaili }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = not_shia_caliphate_revolt_ongoing
				NOT = { has_global_flag = ismaili_caliphate_revolt_ongoing }
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = sayyid
					piety = 1000
				}
				AND = {
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = ismaili_bloodline_TT
						any_owned_bloodline = {
							has_bloodline_flag = bloodline_ismaili_leader
							bloodline_is_active_for = PREV
						}
					}
					piety = 500
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates } }
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = controls_mecca_medina
						c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_jerusalem_damascus_baghdad
					c_jerusalem = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_damascus = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_baghdad = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = THREE_HOLY_SITES_TT
				any_realm_title = {
					count = 3
					is_holy_site = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates }
			OR = {
				piety = 500
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_mecca_medina
					c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = ismaili_bloodline_TT
					any_owned_bloodline = {
						has_bloodline_flag = bloodline_ismaili_leader
						bloodline_is_active_for = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	title = CALIPH
	title_female = CALIPHA
	foa = CALIPH_FOA
	short_name = yes

	gain_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				d_ismaili = { NOT = { has_title_flag = ismaili_followers } }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				character_event = { id = emf_heresy.1973 days = 30 }
			}
		}
	}
} # end d_ismaili

d_mahdiyya = {
	color = { 180 0 0 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 719 # Mecca

	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 100 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	title = CALIPH
	title_female = CALIPHA
	foa = CALIPH_FOA

	short_name = yes
	religion = mahdiyya
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = mahdiyya
	assimilate = no
	caliphate = yes
	coat_of_arms = {
		data = { 0 0 0 9 1 7 7 }
		religion = mahdiyya
	}

	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = mahdiyya } }
			religion = mahdiyya
		}
		OR = {
			trait = mirza
			trait = sayyid
			piety = 1000
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_random_religions = no }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = mahdiyya_creation_independent
				in_revolt = no
				OR = {
					independent = yes
					NOT = {
						any_liege = {
							OR = {
								in_revolt = yes
								NOT = { religion = mahdiyya }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = sayyid
					piety = 1000
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates } }
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = controls_mecca_medina
						c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_jerusalem_damascus_baghdad
					c_jerusalem = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_damascus = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_baghdad = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = THREE_HOLY_SITES_TT
				any_realm_title = {
					count = 3
					is_holy_site = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_mecca_medina
				c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

	coat_of_arms = {
		data = { 0 0 0 9 1 7 7 }
		religion = shiite
	}
	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = shiite } }
			religion = shiite
		}
		OR = {
			trait = mirza
			trait = sayyid
			piety = 1000
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_random_religions = no }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = shia_creation_independent
				in_revolt = no
				OR = {
					independent = yes
					NOT = {
						any_liege = {
							OR = {
								in_revolt = yes
								NOT = { religion = shiite }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = sayyid
					piety = 1000
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates } }
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = controls_mecca_medina
						c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_jerusalem_damascus_baghdad
					c_jerusalem = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_damascus = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_baghdad = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = THREE_HOLY_SITES_TT
				any_realm_title = {
					count = 3
					is_holy_site = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_mecca_medina
				c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	title = IMAM
	title_female = IMAMA
	foa = IMAM_FOA
	short_name = yes
} # end d_shiite

d_waldensian = {
	color = { 170 254 255 }
	color2 = { 230 220 108 }
	capital = 227 # Lyons

	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	dignity = 20

	title = "WALDENSIAN_PRIMATE"
	foa = "POPE_FOA"
	short_name = yes

	religion = waldensian

	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = waldensian

	dynasty_title_names = no	 # Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.
}

d_zaydi = {
	color = { 40 160 40 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	capital = 719 # Makkah # Mecca

	creation_requires_capital = no
	dignity = 80 # Counted as having this many more counties than it does
	religion = zaydi
	# Controls a religion
	controls_religion = zaydi
	caliphate = yes

	title = IMAM
	title_female = IMAMA
	foa = IMAM_FOA
	short_name = yes

	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { NOT = { religion = zaydi } }
			religion = zaydi
		}
		OR = {
			trait = mirza
			trait = sayyid
			piety = 1000
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_random_religions = no }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = zaydi_creation_independent
				in_revolt = no
				OR = {
					independent = yes
					NOT = {
						any_liege = {
							OR = {
								in_revolt = yes
								NOT = { religion = zaydi }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = sayyid
					piety = 1000
				}
				trigger_if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates } }
					custom_tooltip = {
						text = controls_mecca_medina
						c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
						c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = controls_jerusalem_damascus_baghdad
					c_jerusalem = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_damascus = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
					c_baghdad = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_else = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = THREE_HOLY_SITES_TT
				any_realm_title = {
					count = 3
					is_holy_site = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = destroyed_caliphates }
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = controls_mecca_medina
				c_mecca = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
				c_medina = { owner_under_ROOT = yes }
			}
		}
	}
} # end d_zaydi
